properties.areaDesc: Morton; Burleigh; Sioux; Emmons; Grant; Oliver
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 8:07PM CST by NWS Bismarck ND
properties.description:
Weather radars show a band of light snow or light freezing rain
developing east into south central North Dakota this Saturday
evening. With road surface temperatures below freezing, ice
accumulations on roadways are likely.

The wintry mix extended from near Hazen south through central
Grant county. Interstate 94 between Hebron and Steele will likely
be impacted. along with other locations such as Center, Carson,
Flasher, Selfridge and Fort Yates, Mandan and Bismarck, and Linton.

Roads and sidewalks will become slippery. Use extra caution and
slow down. Allow for longer braking distances.

NWSheadline: WINTRY MIX OF SNOW OR LIGHT FREEZING RAIN MOVING ACROSS SOUTH CENTRAL NORTH DAKOTA THIS EVENING
